scripts.install:cleanup: egrep -r -l --include package.json '"(post|pre)?install":' ./node_modules | cut -d / -f 1-3 | uniq | xargs rm -rf
scripts.install:recover: npm run install:cleanup && npm run install
scripts.start: npm run install && npm run dev -s
scripts.watch: node ./node_modules/parallelshell/index.js 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:assets' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.build: echo '=> build the project' && npm run copy:assets -s && npm run copy:html -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run lint -s && npm run copy:angular -s && npm run copy:bootstrap -s && npm run copy:strings -s
scripts.build:js: echo '=> build:js' && node ./node_modules/uglifyjs/bin/uglifyjs src/app/*/*/*.module.js src/app/*/*/*.js src/app/*/*.module.js src/app/*/*.js src/app/*.module.js src/app/*.js -o dist/app/app.js
scripts.watch:js: echo '=> watch:js' && node ./node_modules/onchange/cli.js src/app/*.js src/app/**/*.js src/app/**/**/*.js -- npm run build:js -s
scripts.copy:html: echo '=> copy:html' && node ./node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/app && cp src/app/**/*.html dist/app && cp src/index.html dist
scripts.copy:bootstrap: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/assets/bootstrap && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/assets/bootstrap && npm run copy:jquery -s
scripts.dev: npm run lint -s && npm run build -s && node ./node_modules/parallelshell/index.js 'npm run browser-sync -s' 'npm run watch -s'
scripts.reinstall: npm cache clean && npm run install
scripts.dev:build: npm run install && npm run prebuild && npm run build
